snippet.title: ELYPSE - Reveal trailer
snippet.description:
Embark upon a tragic tale and discover the ravaged world of Elypse! Fight your destiny in an arduous metroidvania platformer experience, in a mesmerising and mysterious world.

Steam page - https://store.steampowered.com/app/1725340/Elypse/

Twitter - https://twitter.com/Hot_Chili_Games

Website - https://www.hotchiligames.com/
